radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT ABD & PELVIS W & W/O CONTRAST, ADDL SECTIONS
radiographic_examinations.findings: 2.4 x 1.3 x 1.7 cm hypodense lesion in the tail of the pancreas with mild pancreatic duct dilatation (up to 3mm). 1.2 x 3.6 x 5.4 cm fluid density collection along the left anterior peritoneal lining between the liver and left rectus musculature. Bibasilar atelectasis. Small right and trace left pleural effusions.
Multiple small cysts in the tail of the pancreas measuring 3.0 x 1.9 cm likely representing IPMN. Mild associated dilatation of the pancreatic duct (up to 3mm).
